newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore bunkers little changed, demand average.
newsitem.headline: Singapore bunkers little changed, demand average.

text.p: Singapore bunkers were quoted little changed amid average demand, brokers said on Tuesday.

Majors were indicating $112 for 180 cst and at $108 for 380 cst supplies. Independents were lower at $105 for 380-cst and at $110 for 180-cst. Prices on Monday were at $105-$108 for 380-cst and at $110-$112 for 180-cst.
Brokers said some shipowners have decided to buy their bunkers supplies at Port Klang, South Korea or Colombo where prices were more competitive.
MDO was steady at $186-$191 and gas oil at $200-$205.
